title: Payment Processing Policy
description: Guidelines for handling customer payment issues
rules: All payment disputes must be investigated within 24 hours. Refunds require manager approval for amounts over $100.

title: Account Access Policy
description: Procedures for account lockouts and password resets
rules: Password resets require email verification. Account lockouts after 5 failed attempts require manual unlock.

title: System Maintenance Policy
description: Guidelines for system maintenance and downtime
rules: All maintenance must be scheduled during off-peak hours. Customers must be notified 48 hours in advance.

title: Refund Policy
rules: Full refunds available within 30 days of purchase. Partial refunds may be offered for service issues.

title: Data Privacy Policy
description: Customer data handling and privacy protection
rules: Customer data cannot be shared without explicit consent. All data access must be logged and audited.

title: Communication Policy
rules: All communications must be professional and helpful. Response time should not exceed 24 hours.

title: Security Policy
rules: All systems require multi-factor authentication. Security incidents must be reported immediately.

title: Subscription Policy
rules: Subscription changes take effect at next billing cycle. Cancellations require 30-day notice.
